name: Avidemux
description: Avidemux is a free video editor with cutting, filtering and encoding operations. It supports to edit AVI and MPEG files, and can break out sound from files. And it's also characterized with powerful queue task processing and script functions.

en_US.description: Avidemux is a free video editor with cutting, filtering and encoding operations. It supports to edit AVI and MPEG files, and can break out sound from files. And it's also characterized with powerful queue task processing and script functions.
en_US.name: Avidemux

zh_CN.description: Avidemux是一个免费的视频编辑器，可以进行剪切、过滤和编码等操作。它支持AVI文件、MPEG文件的编辑，并能将声音从文件中分解出来，同时具有强大的队列任务处理和脚本功能。
zh_CN.name: Avidemux
